summary: This bill, the National Landslide Preparedness Act Reauthorization Act of 2025, reauthorizes and amends the National Landslide Preparedness Act. It updates definitions related to atmospheric rivers and extreme precipitation events, enhances the National Landslide Hazards Reduction Program, and expands stakeholder involvement to include Native Hawaiian organizations, Tribal organizations, and institutions of higher education. The bill also establishes regional partnerships and increases funding for landslide early warning systems and 3D elevation programs to improve preparedness, monitoring, and response to landslide events, including those exacerbated by climate change impacts.
